description.givenName: Given name. In the U.S., the first name of a person
description.familyName: Family name. In the U.S., the last name of a person
description.jobTitle: The job title of the person (for example, Financial Manager)
description.telephone: Phone numbers and icon. Array with arrays containing [number: string, icon: smartphone]
description.visitingAddress: Visiting address of the person (if different from the physical address)
description.description: A brief description of the person
description.image: An image of the person, URL or image ID
description.administrationUnit: The administration unit the person belongs to
description.socialMedia: Social media links for the person
description.customSections: Custom sections for additional information about the person
description.useAvatarFallback: Use an avatar image if no image is provided
description.view: The view file to render the person component, simple or extended
